🎮 **Game Features Deployed!** 🎮

Sunny now has interactive games and entertainment! Render will auto-deploy in 2-3 minutes.

**New Features:**
🎯 **Trivia Games** - Start trivia with categories & difficulties
📊 **Polls** - Create native Discord polls with multiple options
🗳️ **Quick Polls** - Yes/No/Maybe button polls
✂️ **Mini-Games** - Rock-Paper-Scissors, Number Guessing, Dice Roll
🎱 **Magic 8-Ball** - Ask yes/no questions
📚 **Fun Facts** - Random interesting facts
🏆 **Leaderboards** - Track scores across all games

**How to use:**
Ask Sunny naturally! Examples:
• "sunny start a trivia game about science"
• "sunny create a poll: What should we play next?"
• "sunny play rock paper scissors"
• "sunny roll a dice"
• "sunny show the game leaderboard"

Ready to test in ~2 minutes!
